1386770.name: Blip (Open Alpha)
1386770.description:
Our goal with Blip is to build an Open-Source Roblox alternative.
It's primarily designed for mobile, but fully playable on Windows & macOS too! ğŸ˜„

Blip is a platform where players and creators come together to build, play, and share unique gaming experiences.Â Whether you're battling friends, designing a custom avatar, or crafting your own game world, Blip offers endless creative freedom.

For Players:

  • Customize your avatar with unique outfits and accessories.

  • Explore a growing library of community-created games, from arcade puzzles to real-time multiplayer adventures.

  • Play with your friends and meet new ones!

For Creators:

  • Design 3D assets and avatar equipment

  • Build your own games with the embedded World Editor and Luau scripting

  • Share your creations with the community and earn virtual currency (with plans for real-world monetization in the future)

Join Now!

Blip is in its early stages, making now the perfect time to join as a pioneer! Shape the platformâ€™s future, connect with a passionate community, and leave your mark as one of Blipâ€™s first creators or players.
